titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 78) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to permit Delegates and the Resident Commissioner to the Congress to cast votes in the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union.

Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 78) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to permit Delegates and the Resident Commissioner to the Congress to cast votes in the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union.

action.text: During consideration of H.Res 78 pursuant to this resolution, notwithstanding the operation of the previous question, the Chair may postpone further consideration of the bill to a time designated by the Speaker.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-3, by Mr. Hastings (FL).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 3.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 86.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 191 (Roll no. 51).
Mr. Dreier moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. McGovern moved to table the motion to reconsider the vote.
On motion to table the motion to reconsider the vote Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 189 (Roll No. 52).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 188 (Roll no. 53).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 78) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to permit Delegates and the Resident Commissioner to the Congress to cast votes in the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union.
